entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:48 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
